description: Provides a lifecycle configuration for SageMaker Notebook Instances.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Name.description: The name of the lifecycle configuration (must be unique). If omitted, Terraform will assign a random, unique name.

OnCreate.description: A shell script (base64-encoded) that runs only once when the SageMaker Notebook Instance is created.

OnStart.description: A shell script (base64-encoded) that runs every time the SageMaker Notebook Instance is started including the time it's created.
